ai-tika-s0404t25:2_2: Even if there are nine reasons, but only the result of sensual pleasures, performed a result of good deeds, and the result of past deeds, and he is able to bring back the beginning. Only after being able to abundant deeds,
ai-tika-s0404t25:2_3: That’s why it’s unloved, burst out water.’
ai-tika-s0404t25:3_0: The first section for recitation on the hells is finished.
ai-tika-s0404t25:4_0: So there are mansions for the Nuns
ai-tika-s0404t25:5_0: The tenth sections on the beautiful ones have been bound to the underworld.
ai-tika-s0404t25:6_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
